label: 由利公正
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1829-1909). Echizen hirazamurai (100 koku). With Hashimoto Sanai and Yokoi Shonan, adviser to Matsudaira Shungaku; finance specialist. Links with anti-Bakufu leaders, especially those of Satsuma. Senior posts in early Meiji government, but little political activity after 1871.
